headers.Access-Control-Allow-Headers: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version

headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.supabase.co https://ep-crimson-rice-aehes3mk.apirest.c-2.us-east-2.aws.neon.tech https://ik.imagekit.io https://api.cloudinary.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
